Text: Hey, So I heard about all of these private servers and stuff...and I really want a 255 server...I heard Eternal-wow was awesome, and Im about to go try it, someone should tell me about it ^^

Shadowcog, I'm not to sure what you mean by "a 255 server" but ill take a guess that that's the level cap of the server. Truewow is not one of those servers but i would be glad to look one up for you. If you gave me some more information on the type of server like the patch of the preferred servers or the rates of the preferred servers, that would really help me help you.
